about_the_game:
Naptime's over!

With rumbling stomachs and no snacks in sight, explore a deserted daycare overrun by vengeful toys. From the nap room to the basement storage, navigate through the eerie corridors and relentless toy onslaught in your quest for snacks.

Features:

  • Crawling Babies: Play as one of four toddlers crawling around the daycare. Careful standing up though, as walking around can result in tripping.
  • Tantrum-based Health System: As the players take damage, they inch closer to totally flipping out. Don't throw a tantrum for too long, or the attendant will take notice.
  • Toy-filled Chaos: Battle through waves of mischievous toy enemies, ranging from pint-sized troublemakers to formidable toy bosses.
  • Uncanny labyrinth: From the Daycare's nap room, traverse the halls and delve into the eerie cellar in search of snacks.

Characters:

  • Dillian: The French-Korean baby, self-appointed leader of the snack brigade
  • Joah-Joah: The buff baby, muscle of the group
  • Phoebe: The toy expert, hungriest of them all
  • Travis: The lookout, aware of his surroundings

name: Daycare Descent
short_description: Daycare Descent is a co-op shooter inspired by Left 4 Dead. Take control of our four trepid adventurers as they battle toys throughout the daycare in search of snacks. Tighten your diapers, grab your pacifiers, and fill up your water guns. Playtime's just begun!
